=========
Changelog
=========

2.0.3 (2017-04-20)
==================

* Fix occasional UnicodeEncode when reading UTF-8 file.
* Handle bad characters in files when parsing with ``ast``.

0.1.0 to 2.0.2 (2016-10-06)
===========================

* Development (alpha then beta version).

0.1.0 (2016-10-06)
==================

* Alpha release on PyPI.
